segments.text: Take a seat inside and see what you think.So you will take the Porsche then , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and I want to buy the insurance too . I think it's necessary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're smart to buy it . At 45 dollars for three days , it is a good deal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I return the car in San Francisco ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: San Francisco ? No , sir.We only have this office here . You will have to return it here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I heard in America you can return rental cars in different cities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir . That's only with the very big companies . I'm sorry , but this car must be returned to this lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess I will have to drive back down then . Hmm . I didn't think of that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you still want the car , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It will be fun . Driving back down the coast . My girlfriend will like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , sir . We have to finish filling out the forms .
segments.speaker: S1
